version_description:
• App icon hasn't changed
• Shake to Shuffle (see Settings)
• Sleep Timer (In-App Purchase. Why? Because the app is free, has no ads, and it costs us a (metric) tonne of money to keep all our stations up to date and release nifty updates for you!)
• Fixed Wish List iCloud sync issue that affected some users
• Fixed accessibility issue that caused some buttons to be incorrectly read as dimmed
• Stability and performance improvements

• App icon hasn't changed
• Shake to Shuffle (see Settings)
• Sleep Timer (In-App Purchase. Why? Because the app is free, has no ads, and it costs us a (metric) tonne of money to keep all our stations up to date and release nifty updates for you!)
• Fixed Wish List iCloud sync issue that affected some users
• Fixed accessibility issue that caused some buttons to be incorrectly read as dimmed
• Stability and performance improvements

• App icon hasn't changed
• Shake to Shuffle (see Settings)
• Sleep Timer (In-App Purchase. Why? Because the app is free, has no ads, and it costs us a (metric) tonne of money to keep all our stations up to date and release nifty updates for you!)
• Fixed Wish List iCloud sync issue that affected some users
• Fixed accessibility issue that caused some buttons to be incorrectly read as dimmed
• Stability and performance improvements

• New "Nearby Stations" search option (tap "Find More Stations…" in the main screen)
• New Data Saver option in Settings
• Fixed rare crash that would happen for some users when listening to certain US stations
• Fixed a condition that would prevent Radium from connecting to stations on certain iPhone 4/4S models
• Next/Previous lock-screen/bluetooth/headphone buttons play the next/previous station in the currently visible stations list
• Disabling screen auto-lock when dock cable is plugged in
• Fixed VoiceOver glitches in the Sound Enhancer and Settings
• Stability and performance improvements

• New "Nearby Stations" search option (tap "Find More Stations…" in the main screen)
• New Data Saver option in Settings
• Fixed rare crash that would happen for some users when listening to certain US stations
• Fixed a condition that would prevent Radium from connecting to stations on certain iPhone 4/4S models
• Next/Previous lock-screen/bluetooth/headphone buttons play the next/previous station in the currently visible stations list
• Disabling screen auto-lock when dock cable is plugged in
• Fixed VoiceOver glitches in the Sound Enhancer and Settings
• Stability and performance improvements

• New "Nearby Stations" search option (tap "Find More Stations…" in the main screen)
• New Data Saver option in Settings
• Fixed rare crash that would happen for some users when listening to certain US stations
• Fixed a condition that would prevent Radium from connecting to stations on certain iPhone 4/4S models
• Next/Previous lock-screen/bluetooth/headphone buttons play the next/previous station in the currently visible stations list
• Disabling screen auto-lock when dock cable is plugged in
• Fixed VoiceOver glitches in the Sound Enhancer and Settings
• Stability and performance improvements

• Reduced energy usage when using Location Services 
• Fixed streaming issues for some premium subscriptions

• Reduced energy usage when using Location Services 
• Fixed streaming issues for some premium subscriptions

• Reduced energy usage when using Location Services 
• Fixed streaming issues for some premium subscriptions

• Between 9pm and 3am, Radium will show a button to activate the Sleep Timer in the gear-wheel (Settings) menu. How convenient!
• Fixed issue that would cause some stations to experience dropouts
• VoiceOver fixes and improvements

• Between 9pm and 3am, Radium will show a button to activate the Sleep Timer in the gear-wheel (Settings) menu. How convenient!
• Fixed issue that would cause some stations to experience dropouts
• VoiceOver fixes and improvements

• Between 9pm and 3am, Radium will show a button to activate the Sleep Timer in the gear-wheel (Settings) menu. How convenient!
• Fixed issue that would cause some stations to experience dropouts
• VoiceOver fixes and improvements
Radium only uses Location Services when in use.

Album art is back!
Other minor fixes.
